appointmenttester

Class Appointment

  • java.lang.Object
    • appointmenttester.Appointment
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    DailyAppointment, MonthlyAppointment, OnetimeAppointment

    public abstract class Appointment
extends java.lang.Object
    A base class for representing appointments that a person might put on their calendar

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Appointment(java.lang.String descript, int d, int m, int y)
      Creates an appointment with a specified day, month, year, as well as a description of the appointment.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      int getDay()
      Returns the day of an appointment.
      java.lang.String getDescription()
      Returns a brief description of the purpose of the appointment.
      int getMonth()
      Returns the month of the appointment.
      int getYear()
      Returns the year of the appointment.
      abstract boolean occursOn(int d, int m, int y)
      Determines whether or not an appointment will occur on a specified day

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • Constructor Detail

      • Appointment

        public Appointment(java.lang.String descript,
           int d,
           int m,
           int y)
        Creates an appointment with a specified day, month, year, as well as a description of the appointment.
        Parameters:
        descript - a short description of what the appointment is for
        d - the day of the month on which the appointment occurs
        m - the number of the month (1-12) when the appointment occurs
        y - the year in which the appointment occurs

    • Method Detail

      • getDescription

        public java.lang.String getDescription()
        Returns a brief description of the purpose of the appointment.
        Returns:
        a description of the purpose of the appointment

      • getDay

        public int getDay()
        Returns the day of an appointment.
        Returns:
        the day of the month on which the appointment occurs

      • getMonth

        public int getMonth()
        Returns the month of the appointment.
        Returns:
        the number of the month in which the appointment occurs, using the convention that January is month number 1, etc.

      • getYear

        public int getYear()
        Returns the year of the appointment.
        Returns:
        the year in which the appointment occurs

      • occursOn

        public abstract boolean occursOn(int d,
               int m,
               int y)
        Determines whether or not an appointment will occur on a specified day
        Parameters:
        d - the day of the month that is of interest
        m - the number of the month (1-12) that is of interest
        y - the year of interest
        Returns:
        a value of true is returned if the appointment will occur on the specified day, month, and year. Otherwise, false is returned.
